specific_edits.location: Foundation Building segment, glymphatic system paragraph
specific_edits.current: Dr. Maiken Nedergaard at the University of Rochester discovered something fascinating - your brain has a cleaning system called the glymphatic system that becomes incredibly active during sleep. Think of it like a dishwasher for your brain
specific_edits.suggested: Dr. Maiken Nedergaard at the University of Rochester discovered something fascinating - your brain has a cleaning system called the glymphatic system that becomes incredibly active during sleep. Think of it like your brain's cleaning crew that works the night shift - while you're unconscious, cerebrospinal fluid washes through your brain tissue like a dishwasher cleaning dishes
specific_edits.rationale: Provides layered analogy for better accessibility without changing content

model_agreement_analysis.notes: Models agree on strengths, minor divergence on accessibility improvements
